oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: This Little Light of Mine Programs: Hoss Allen: The Radio Voice of Gospel Music - William Herbert Brewster: Gospel Songwriter
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: The recording is of two segments of This Little Light of Mine. This Little Light of Mine is a show that provides introspection to the main influencers of African-American gospel. The segments are hosted by Bobby Jones (host). The first segment reflects on the life of Hoss Allen (singer/songwriter), and is called "Hoss Allen: the Radio Voice of Black Gospel." The second segment is hosted by an unidentified host and features William Brewster (songwriter). The second segment is called, "William Herbert Brewster: Gospel Songwriter" The recordings are from unidentified dates.
